channel.title: CoReACTER
channel.description: Organization website for the Community of Researchers Assessing Chemical Transformations and Exploring Reactivity (CoReACTER)

item.title: CoReACTER Philosophy: Principles
item.description: A description of the core principles guiding the work of the CoReACTER, and a brief overview of our broader philosophies. Note that our ideas and methods are evolving, and so this document should be considered a snapshot, rather than a static ideology.

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith

item.title: Research
item.description: A description of the research that happens in and around the CoReACTER. We focus primarily on computational and data chemistry, supplemented and supported by (mostly high-throughput) experiments. We work on method development, but our efforts are generally focused on applications related to sustainability. Currently, we are thinking about battery energy storage, electrocatalysis, and plastic waste management.

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith

item.title: Open Science and the CoReACTER

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith

item.title: CoReACTER Publications
item.description: Scholarly works published by the CoReACTER. This page is updated regularly with any papers published by the CoReACTER as an organization. Note that not all papers with ReACTERs as authors will be included here. For a complete list of publications by Prof. Spotte-Smith, you can check out their website.

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith

item.title: CoReACTER
item.description: The CoReACTER home page. We're a research organization operating in the Department of Chemical Engineering of Carnegie Mellon University (CMU).

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith

item.title: CoReACTER Blog
item.description: The blog of the CoReACTER. Here, ReACTERs will post discussions of scientific topics, tutorials, and philosophical musings. All posts have been vetted and approved by the CoReACTER collectively but do not necessarily reflect the opinions of all ReACTERs.

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith

item.title: Decision-Making in the CoReACTER
item.description: General practices and guidelines for decision-making in the CoReACTER.

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith

item.title: CoReACTER Resources
item.description: This page contains resources that are mainly designed for members of the CoReACTER community (ReACTERs and collaborators). Some resources may also be helpful to others at CMU or to members of the broader chemical or scientific community.
